document.title: World Languages Next Generation Sunshine State Standards

44743D20DFE50131E80468A86D17958E.description: Interact with people of other cultures in the target language about familiar and unfamiliar topics that have a significant impact in our daily lives.

4473C970DFE50131E80368A86D17958E.description: Use the skills acquired in the target language to interact with native speakers of the language on a variety of topics.

4472D7B0DFE50131E80168A86D17958E.description: Access organizations or individuals through different types of communication to request information about professional activities (such as job opportunities) available in the target language.

44726EF0DFE50131E80068A86D17958E.description: Use language skills and cultural understanding beyond immediate environment for personal growth.

44718F10DFE50131E7FE68A86D17958E.description: Engage in opportunities to increase awareness of careers for which skills in another language and cross-cultural understandings are needed by accessing information through different media.

44712450DFE50131E7FD68A86D17958E.description: Use knowledge acquired in the target language to access information on careers and employment opportunities.

44703680DFE50131E7FB68A86D17958E.description: Create and present activities in the target language (i.e., drama, poetry, art, music) through a variety of media where communication is extended outside the classroom.

446FD230DFE50131E7FA68A86D17958E.description: Apply knowledge gained in the target language to make presentations as part of extra-curricular activities beyond the school setting.

446F0870DFE50131E7F868A86D17958E.description: Participate in activities where communication in the target language is expected (i.e., writing a letter to the editor, or engaging in an online discussion on a community issue).

446E9660DFE50131E7F768A86D17958E.description: Use knowledge acquired in the target language to reach out to the community to discuss a variety of topics and present point of view.

446DCC50DFE50131E7F568A86D17958E.description: Use a variety of media venues in the target language to access information about community events and organizations where the target language is spoken.

446D62A0DFE50131E7F468A86D17958E.description: Use expanded vocabulary and structures in the target language to access different media and community resources.

446C86A0DFE50131E7F268A86D17958E.description: Communicate with people locally and/or around the world, through e-mail, video, online communities and/or face-to face encounters.

446C0F10DFE50131E7F168A86D17958E.description: Use the target language to participate in different activities for personal enjoyment and enrichment.

446B0930DFE50131E7EF68A86D17958E.description: Use communication tools to establish a connection with a peer from a country where the target language is spoken.

446AA690DFE50131E7EE68A86D17958E.description: Use key target language vocabulary to communicate with others within and beyond the school setting.

4469DA30DFE50131E7EC68A86D17958E.description: Participate in simple presentations, activities, and cultural events in local, global, and/or online communities.

446965F0DFE50131E7EB68A86D17958E.description: Use key words and phrases in the target language to participate in different activities in the school and community settings.

44688C00DFE50131E7E968A86D17958E.description: Communities: The student will be able to use the target language both within and beyond the school setting to investigate and improve his/her world beyond his/her immediate surroundings for personal growth and enrichment.

446825B0DFE50131E7E868A86D17958E.description: Research different aspects of the target culture(s) and own culture in order to evaluate and refine generalizations and dispel stereotypes.

4467B8C0DFE50131E7E768A86D17958E.description: Analyze and explain local, regional, and national language differences in the countries where the target language is spoken.

44674FB0DFE50131E7E668A86D17958E.description: Analyze the relationship of historical and contemporary attitudes, behaviors, and products in the target culture and compare to own culture.

44666410DFE50131E7E468A86D17958E.description: Research cultural traditions and celebrations that exist in the target cultures and other cultures and evaluate the viewpoints behind them.

4465F1D0DFE50131E7E368A86D17958E.description: Investigate regional and national sound pattern differences (e.g., pronounciation, intonation, word stress) within the target language and own.

446573C0DFE50131E7E268A86D17958E.description: Analyze the form, meaning, and importance of perspectives, practices, and products of the target culture and compare it to own culture.

446482C0DFE50131E7E068A86D17958E.description: Conduct research on works produced by native speakers of the target language (e.g., writers, journalists, artists, media persons) to determine cultural impact on our own language and culture.

44641080DFE50131E7DF68A86D17958E.description: Analyze the sound symbol association between the target language and own.

4463ACB0DFE50131E7DE68A86D17958E.description: Describe cultural perspectives as reflected in a variety of literary genres and compare and contrast to own culture.

4462DE20DFE50131E7DC68A86D17958E.description: Develop an appreciation for cultural differences by comparing and contrasting patterns of behavior or interaction in various cultural settings including student's own.

44626E00DFE50131E7DB68A86D17958E.description: Discriminate between different registers of language (formal/informal, literary/colloquial, written/conversational) and explain their cultural implications.

4461FC80DFE50131E7DA68A86D17958E.description: Apply new structural patterns acquired in the target language.

4460F440DFE50131E7D868A86D17958E.description: Compare the cultural traditions and celebrations that exist in the target cultures and other cultures with own.

446087E0DFE50131E7D768A86D17958E.description: Compare the use of cognates, word roots, prefixes, suffixes, or sentence structures between the target language and own.

44601E60DFE50131E7D668A86D17958E.description: Compare similarities and differences between the target language and own language.

445F12B0DFE50131E7D468A86D17958E.description: Compare and contrast the geography and history of countries of the target language, and discuss their impact on own culture.

445EA8C0DFE50131E7D368A86D17958E.description: Compare and contrast structural patterns in the target language and own.

445E4360DFE50131E7D268A86D17958E.description: Compare language structures and skills that transfer from one language to another.

445D75A0DFE50131E7D068A86D17958E.description: Discuss familiar topics in other subject areas, such as geography, history, music, art, science, math, language, or literature.

445D0480DFE50131E7CF68A86D17958E.description: Give examples of cognates, false cognates, idiomatic expressions, and sentence structure to show understanding of how languages are alike and different.

445C8DC0DFE50131E7CE68A86D17958E.description: Recognize language patterns and cultural differences when comparing own language and culture with the target language and culture.

445BB1C0DFE50131E7CC68A86D17958E.description: Compare and contrast specific cultural traits of the target culture and compare to own culture (typical dances, food, celebrations, etc.)

445B3D00DFE50131E7CB68A86D17958E.description: Compare basic sound patterns and grammatical structures between the target language and own language.

445AD890DFE50131E7CA68A86D17958E.description: Distinguish similarities and differences among the patterns of behavior of the target language by comparing information acquired in the target language to further knowledge of own language and culture.

4459E9A0DFE50131E7C868A86D17958E.description: Identify celebrations typical of the target culture and one's own.

44596C80DFE50131E7C768A86D17958E.description: Recognize true and false cognates in the target language and compare them to own language.

445906E0DFE50131E7C668A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate basic knowledge acquired in the target language in order to compare words that are similar to those in his/her own language.

44583730DFE50131E7C468A86D17958E.description: Comparisons: The student will be able to develop insight into the nature of the target language and culture by comparing his/her own language(s) and cultures to others.

4457C6E0DFE50131E7C368A86D17958E.description: Investigate and interpret findings from authentic resources written in the target language on world events and current news related to the arts and sciences.

44576330DFE50131E7C268A86D17958E.description: Use knowledge acquired through target language resources from a variety of subject areas to investigate and interpret and evaluate findings.

44569B30DFE50131E7C068A86D17958E.description: Analyze and synthesize information gathered in the target language to make connections to other content areas and complex real world situations.

44563190DFE50131E7BF68A86D17958E.description: Synthesize information from different subject areas through the target language to further knowledge of own language and culture.

44555980DFE50131E7BD68A86D17958E.description: Analyze, within an unfamiliar context, information from other disciplines to reinforce previous knowledge and acquire new content area knowledge.

4454E380DFE50131E7BC68A86D17958E.description: Analyze, reinforce, and further knowledge of other disciplines through the target language.

4453C720DFE50131E7BA68A86D17958E.description: Distinguish among viewpoints presented through the target language and incorporate this knowledge to reinforce and further knowledge of other disciplines.

445350A0DFE50131E7B968A86D17958E.description: Apply knowledge gained in the target language to make connections to other content areas.

44526D80DFE50131E7B768A86D17958E.description: Gather and interpret information on historic and or contemporary influences from the target language and culture and transfer this information to the language classroom and other disciplines.

44520220DFE50131E7B668A86D17958E.description: Gather and interpret information from various disciplines in the target language to reinforce academic knowledge.

445138C0DFE50131E7B468A86D17958E.description: Use previously acquired vocabulary to discuss familiar topics in other subject areas such as geography, history, music, art, science, math, language, or literature to reinforce and further knowledge of other disciplines through the target language.

4450CF00DFE50131E7B368A86D17958E.description: Use expanded vocabulary and structures in the target language to increase content area knowledge.

444FD050DFE50131E7B168A86D17958E.description: Access new information on historic and/or contemporary influences that underlie selected cultural practices from the target language and culture to obtain new knowledge in the content areas.

444F55C0DFE50131E7B068A86D17958E.description: Access information in the target language to reinforce previously acquired content area knowledge.

444E7BD0DFE50131E7AE68A86D17958E.description: Use maps, graphs, and other graphic organizers to facilitate comprehension and expression of key vocabulary in the target language to reinforce existing content area knowledge.

444E0FF0DFE50131E7AD68A86D17958E.description: Use vocabulary acquired in the target language to access new knowledge from other disciplines.

444D3EF0DFE50131E7AB68A86D17958E.description: Identify (within a familiar context and supported by visuals) basic information common to the world language classroom and other disciplines.

444CCDB0DFE50131E7AA68A86D17958E.description: Identify key words and phrases in the target language that are based on previous knowledge acquired in subject area classes.

444BF180DFE50131E7A868A86D17958E.description: Connections: The student will be able to acquire, reinforce, and further his/her knowledge of other disciplines through the target language.

444B8010DFE50131E7A768A86D17958E.description: Examine the relationships between products and perspectives among groups in other societies (e.g., mythology relates to the perspective of a belief system, folk medicine relates to the perspective of health care).

444AFD90DFE50131E7A668A86D17958E.description: Interpret information in the target language on a variety of topics related to the target culture's philosophy, social issues, regionalisms and cultural traditions presented through a variety of media, including authentic materials.

444A62F0DFE50131E7A568A86D17958E.description: Discuss various aspects of the target culture such as world events and other current news taken place in order to determine their global significance.

4449F520DFE50131E7A468A86D17958E.description: Apply knowledge and understanding of the practices and perspectives of the target culture(s) (such as social and political factors) in order to communicate effectively within and beyond the classroom.

444919B0DFE50131E7A268A86D17958E.description: Analyze diverse cultural products among groups in other societies (e.g., celebrations, literature, architecture, music, dance, theater, political systems, economic systems, number systems, social systems, belief systems).

4448A520DFE50131E7A168A86D17958E.description: Summarize the impact of influential people and events and their contributions to the global community.

44483630DFE50131E7A068A86D17958E.description: Analyze aspects of the target language that are expressions of culture.

4447CBF0DFE50131E79F68A86D17958E.description: Discuss practices and perspectives of the culture(s) studied and describe how they are interrelated to topics of philosophy, social issues, regionalisms, and traditions of cultures other than own.

4446EC50DFE50131E79D68A86D17958E.description: Research diverse cultural products among groups in other societies (e.g., celebrations, literature, architecture, music, dance, theater, political systems, economic systems, number systems, social systems, belief systems).

444681A0DFE50131E79C68A86D17958E.description: Evaluate the effects of the target culture's contributions on other societies.

44460F90DFE50131E79B68A86D17958E.description: Use background knowledge and think critically in order to function successfully within the target culture to meet personal, professional, and academic needs.

44458810DFE50131E79A68A86D17958E.description: Evaluate practices and perspectives (such as patterns of behavior, values, attitudes, beliefs or viewpoints) typical of the target culture(s).

4444A910DFE50131E79868A86D17958E.description: Discuss products from the target culture(s) (e.g., food, shelter, clothing, transportation, music, art, dance, sports and recreation, language, customs, traditions, literature).

44444200DFE50131E79768A86D17958E.description: Analyze the contributions of diverse groups within the target culture(s) made by scientists, mathematicians, writers, political leaders, migrants, immigrants, athletes).

4443D660DFE50131E79668A86D17958E.description: Explain why the target language has value in culture and in a global society.

44436730DFE50131E79568A86D17958E.description: Compare and contrast cultural practices and perspectives among cultures with the same language in order to dispel stereotyping.

44425650DFE50131E79368A86D17958E.description: Describe various products across cultures (e.g., food, shelter, clothing, transportation, music, art, dance, sports and recreation, language, customs, traditions, literature).

4441EB40DFE50131E79268A86D17958E.description: Discuss historical or current contributions of groups representing other languages or cultures (e.g., explorers, historical figures, artists, inventors, etc.)

44418570DFE50131E79168A86D17958E.description: Apply language and behaviors that are appropriate to the target culture in an authentic situation.

44411A00DFE50131E79068A86D17958E.description: Investigate practices and perspectives of past and contemporary life in the target culture through a variety of media.

44402170DFE50131E78E68A86D17958E.description: Identify similarities and differences in products across cultures (e.g., food, shelter, clothing, transportation, music, art, dance, sports and recreation, language, customs, traditions, literature).

443FB800DFE50131E78D68A86D17958E.description: Research contributions made by individuals from the target culture through the arts such as visual arts, architecture, music, dance, literature, etc.

443F5260DFE50131E78C68A86D17958E.description: Use practices and characteristics of the target cultures for daily activities among peers and adults.

443EEBB0DFE50131E78B68A86D17958E.description: Distinguish patterns of behavior and social interaction in various settings in the target culture(s).

443E1C30DFE50131E78968A86D17958E.description: Identify products of culture (e.g., food, shelter, clothing, transportation, toys, music, art, sports and recreation, language, customs, traditions).

443DAE10DFE50131E78868A86D17958E.description: Examine significant historic and contemporary influences from the cultures studied such as explorers, artists, musicians, and athletes.

443D3280DFE50131E78768A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate awareness and appreciation of cultural practices and expressions in daily activities.

443C9FE0DFE50131E78668A86D17958E.description: Recognize similarities and differences in practices and perspectives used across cultures (e.g., holidays, family life) to understand one's own and others' ways of thinking.

443BD3F0DFE50131E78468A86D17958E.description: Identify cultural artifacts, symbols, and images of the target culture(s).

443B67E0DFE50131E78368A86D17958E.description: Recognize different contributions from countries where the target language is spoken and how these contributions impact our global society (e.g., food, music, art, sports, recreation, famous international figures, movies, etc.)

443AF560DFE50131E78268A86D17958E.description: Identify examples of common beliefs and attitudes and their relationship to practices in the cultures studied.

443A8EE0DFE50131E78168A86D17958E.description: Use information acquired through the study of the practices and perspectives of the target culture(s) to identify some of their characteristics and compare them to own culture.

4439BD80DFE50131E77F68A86D17958E.description: Recognize products of culture (e.g., food, shelter, clothing, transportation, toys).

44395250DFE50131E77E68A86D17958E.description: Participate in age-appropriate and culturally authentic activities such as celebrations, songs, games, and dances.

4438D430DFE50131E77D68A86D17958E.description: Recognize common patterns of behavior (such as body language, gestures) and cultural practices and/or traditions associated with the target culture(s).

44385E70DFE50131E77C68A86D17958E.description: Recognize basic practices and perspectives of cultures where the target language is spoken (such as greetings, holiday celebrations, etc.)

44376DB0DFE50131E77A68A86D17958E.description: Culture: The student will be able to use the target language to gain knowledge and demonstrate understanding of the relationship among practices, products, and perspectives of cultures other than his/her own.

440CBAE0DFE50131E77868A86D17958E.description: Write creative fiction that includes an authentic setting, coherent plot, and distinct characters with effective details.

440C4C60DFE50131E77768A86D17958E.description: Write fluently about complex topics, emphasizing the important issues in a style appropriate to the reader including letters to the editor of a newspaper.

440BDC10DFE50131E77668A86D17958E.description: Use humor and irony when writing an essay.

440B6970DFE50131E77568A86D17958E.description: Incorporate figurative language as well as national and regional idiomatic and culturally authentic expressions in writing.

440B0190DFE50131E77468A86D17958E.description: Write a report based on conducted research summarizing the opinions of others, and analyzing information and facts.

440A96D0DFE50131E77368A86D17958E.description: Write, edit, and prepare for final publication a well-structured critical review of a paper, project, or cultural event.

440A3070DFE50131E77268A86D17958E.description: Effectively and consistently express self in writing using a variety of styles for academic and professional audience and purposes.

440963B0DFE50131E77068A86D17958E.description: Write creative pieces (poetry, narratives, and plays) using effective imaginary and the appropriate literary devices to genre.

4408EBE0DFE50131E76F68A86D17958E.description: Write about a variety of topics and apply appropriate strategies to evaluate and refine the final draft.

44087A00DFE50131E76E68A86D17958E.description: Write a narrative about an experience in a clear, fluent style appropriate to different genres.

440804E0DFE50131E76D68A86D17958E.description: Incorporate metaphors, idiomatic and culturally authentic expressions in writing with ease

440796A0DFE50131E76C68A86D17958E.description: Write with precision and detail about abstract topics synthesizing and summarizing information gathered from various authentic sources (written and oral).

440726A0DFE50131E76B68A86D17958E.description: Create well-structured and easily readable reports, summaries, or articles on complex topics that have been revised and edited for correct use of grammar, varied sentence structure, punctuation, and capitalization.

4406C470DFE50131E76A68A86D17958E.description: Write, with fluency and clarity, well-structured documents on complex topics.

4405E700DFE50131E76868A86D17958E.description: Incorporate figurative language, emotions, gestures, rhythm, and appropriate format into a literary original piece.

440564B0DFE50131E76768A86D17958E.description: Produce a persuasive essay and sustain and justify opinions and arguments in writing.

44050140DFE50131E76668A86D17958E.description: Write with clarity following consistent control of time frames and mood.

4404A050DFE50131E76568A86D17958E.description: Incorporate, with accuracy, idioms and culturally authentic expressions in writing.

44043AD0DFE50131E76468A86D17958E.description: Adapt writing to a variety of audiences, such as editorial readers, professionals, and the general public.

4403CA40DFE50131E76368A86D17958E.description: Produce detailed texts on a broad variety of concrete and professional topics that have been revised and edited with peer input.

44035550DFE50131E76268A86D17958E.description: Write detailed texts on a broad variety of concrete social and professional topics and apply appropriate strategies to evaluate a final product.

44027AA0DFE50131E76068A86D17958E.description: Write in a variety of forms including narratives (fiction, autobiography) with clarity and details.

44020B70DFE50131E75F68A86D17958E.description: Write using style, language, and tone appropriate to the audience and purpose of the presentation.

4401A5B0DFE50131E75E68A86D17958E.description: Write using different time frames and appropriate mood.

44014590DFE50131E75D68A86D17958E.description: Use idioms and idiomatic expressions in writing.

4400E3B0DFE50131E75C68A86D17958E.description: Write well-organized essays, summaries, and reports on a broad range of topics including those that have been personally researched using authentic texts.

440072C0DFE50131E75B68A86D17958E.description: Write work-related documents (fill out an application, prepare a resume, write a business letter).

43FFEAA0DFE50131E75A68A86D17958E.description: Express, in writing, ideas on a variety of topics presented in clear, organized texts.

43FEF2B0DFE50131E75868A86D17958E.description: Write a short essy or biography using descriptive details and a variety of sentence structure.

43FE8160DFE50131E75768A86D17958E.description: Write about a story and describe reactions with clarity and detail.

43FE1180DFE50131E75668A86D17958E.description: Describe, in writing, events in chronological order.

43FDAD70DFE50131E75568A86D17958E.description: Provide clear and detailed information in writing on academic and work topics with clarity and detail.

43FD4300DFE50131E75468A86D17958E.description: Present, in writing, viewpoints on an issue and support opinion with clarity and detail.

43FCD520DFE50131E75368A86D17958E.description: Describe, in writing, personal experiences and interests with clarity and detail.

43FC6640DFE50131E75268A86D17958E.description: Write communications, narratives, descriptions, and explanations on familiar topics using connected, detailed paragraphs.

43FB8350DFE50131E75068A86D17958E.description: Write a narrative based on experiences that use descriptive language and details.

43FB0D70DFE50131E74F68A86D17958E.description: Produce writing that has been edited for punctuation and correct use of grammar, in which the development and organization are appropriate to task and purpose.

43FA9910DFE50131E74E68A86D17958E.description: Draft, edit, and summarize information, concepts, and ideas.

43FA2570DFE50131E74D68A86D17958E.description: Conduct research and write a report on a variety of topics using connected detailed paragraphs.

43F9C040DFE50131E74C68A86D17958E.description: State an opinion and provide supporting evidence using connected sentences.

43F95990DFE50131E74B68A86D17958E.description: Write informative texts through a variety of media using connected sentences and providing supporting facts about the topic.

43F8ED20DFE50131E74A68A86D17958E.description: Write narratives on familiar topics using logically connected sentences with supporting details.

43F81BC0DFE50131E74868A86D17958E.description: Develop a draft of a plan that addresses purpose, audience, logical sequence, and a time frame for completion.

43F7B3C0DFE50131E74768A86D17958E.description: Conduct research and write a detailed plan (e.g., a trip to a country where the target language is spoken).

43F74A00DFE50131E74668A86D17958E.description: Develop questions to obtain and clarify information.

43F6DD50DFE50131E74568A86D17958E.description: Compare and contrast information, concepts, and ideas.

43F66B00DFE50131E74468A86D17958E.description: Express and support opinions on familiar topics using a series of sentences.

43F5FD50DFE50131E74368A86D17958E.description: Describe a familiar event or situation using a variety of sentences and with supporting details.

43F59070DFE50131E74268A86D17958E.description: Write on familiar topics and experiences using main ideas and supporting details.

43F4BCB0DFE50131E74068A86D17958E.description: Pre-write by generating ideas from multiple sources based upon teacher directed topics.

43F41FA0DFE50131E73F68A86D17958E.description: Prepare a draft of an itinerary for a personal experience or event (such as for a trip to a country where the target language is spoken).

43F3AC20DFE50131E73E68A86D17958E.description: Request information in writing to obtain something needed.

43F347D0DFE50131E73D68A86D17958E.description: Write short personal notes using a variety of media.

43F2DE70DFE50131E73C68A86D17958E.description: Write a description of a familiar experience or event.

43F27330DFE50131E73B68A86D17958E.description: Write simple statements to describe aspects of daily life.

43F1FCD0DFE50131E73A68A86D17958E.description: Write descriptions and short messages to request or provide information on familiar topics using phrases and simple sentences.

43F0E910DFE50131E73868A86D17958E.description: Draw pictures in sequence to demonstrate a story plot.

43F08020DFE50131E73768A86D17958E.description: Pre-write by drawing pictures to support ideas related to a task.

43F00F30DFE50131E73668A86D17958E.description: Write about previously acquired knowledge and experiences.

43EFA530DFE50131E73568A86D17958E.description: Write simple sentences that help in day-to-day life communication.

43EF3540DFE50131E73468A86D17958E.description: Write simple sentences about self and/or others.

43EEB780DFE50131E73368A86D17958E.description: Fill out a simple form with basic information.

43EE4240DFE50131E73268A86D17958E.description: Provide basic information in writing using familiar topics, often using previously learned expressions and phrases.

43ED7A80DFE50131E73068A86D17958E.description: Presentational Writing: The student will be able to present information, concepts, and ideas to an audience of readers on a variety of topics in a culturally appropriate context in the target language.

43ED1690DFE50131E72F68A86D17958E.description: Adapt oral presentations spontaneously to meet unexpected needs.

43ECAC30DFE50131E72E68A86D17958E.description: Prepare and present original work (e.g., poems, reports, plays, stories) supported by research.

43EC4160DFE50131E72D68A86D17958E.description: Present fluently and with ease in a variety of settings.

43EBDAE0DFE50131E72C68A86D17958E.description: Adapt presentation to reflect attitudes and culture of the audience.

43EB7010DFE50131E72B68A86D17958E.description: Give a clearly articulated, well-structured presentation on a complex topic.

43EB0460DFE50131E72A68A86D17958E.description: Deliver a clear and fluid presentation for a variety of purposes in a style appropriate to any type of audience.

43EA20D0DFE50131E72868A86D17958E.description: Incorporate with ease appropriate idiomatic and culturally authentic expression in presentations.

43E9A710DFE50131E72768A86D17958E.description: Deliver narrative and informative presentations, including oral responses to literature and use language appropriate to the situation.

43E92A00DFE50131E72668A86D17958E.description: Deliver planned and impromptu presentations to a variety of audiences using appropriate multimedia resources.

43E87F80DFE50131E72568A86D17958E.description: Deliver and defend a viewpoint on an academic or professional issue.

43E82020DFE50131E72468A86D17958E.description: Communicate with accuracy, clarity, and precision on many concrete and abstract topics.

43E7BDC0DFE50131E72368A86D17958E.description: Deliver a clear and precise presentation that engages and informs a specific type of audience.

43E6F510DFE50131E72168A86D17958E.description: Synthesize and summarize information gathered from various authentic sources when speaking to diverse groups.

43E68920DFE50131E72068A86D17958E.description: Narrate a story and describe reactions with clarity and detail.

43E62450DFE50131E71F68A86D17958E.description: Prepare and deliver presentations based on inquiry or research.

43E5BF00DFE50131E71E68A86D17958E.description: Narrate, with ease and detail, events of current, public, or personal interest.

43E557B0DFE50131E71D68A86D17958E.description: Describe, with ease and detail, topics related to home, school, work, leisure activities, and personal interests.

43E4E3C0DFE50131E71C68A86D17958E.description: Deliver an articulated presentation on personal, academic, or professional topics.

43E40210DFE50131E71A68A86D17958E.description: Provide information on academic and job related topics with clarity and detail.

43E39B00DFE50131E71968A86D17958E.description: Make formal presentations about literary selections demonstrating appropriate language choice, body language, eye contact, and use of gestures.

43E33080DFE50131E71868A86D17958E.description: Communicate ideas on a variety of topics with accuracy, clarity, and precision.

43E2C050DFE50131E71768A86D17958E.description: Speak using different time frames and appropriate mood with good control.

43E260D0DFE50131E71668A86D17958E.description: Explain viewpoints on an issue of interest, giving advantages and disadvantages of various options.

43E1FFD0DFE50131E71568A86D17958E.description: Deliver a short presentation on social, academic, or work topics with appropriate complexity for the target audience.

43E139A0DFE50131E71368A86D17958E.description: Formulate and deliver a presentation on an assigned topic using multimedia resources to support the presentation.

43E0D090DFE50131E71268A86D17958E.description: Use paraphrasing, circumlocution, and illustrations to make self more clearly understood when relating experiences and retelling a story.

43E06AE0DFE50131E71168A86D17958E.description: Produce reports and multimedia compositions in order to present a group project.

43DFEED0DFE50131E71068A86D17958E.description: Describe personal experiences and interests with clarity and detail.

43DF78E0DFE50131E70F68A86D17958E.description: Present viewpoints on an issue and support opinions with clarity and detail.

43DEF4A0DFE50131E70E68A86D17958E.description: Present information on familiar topics with clarity and detail using multimedia resources.

43DE26E0DFE50131E70C68A86D17958E.description: Describe, explain, and react to personal experiences using logically connected paragraphs with relevant details.

43DDAE70DFE50131E70B68A86D17958E.description: Retell or summarize a storyline using logically connected sentences with relevant details.

43DD3DC0DFE50131E70A68A86D17958E.description: Provide supporting evidence using logically connected sentences that include relevant details.

43DCD780DFE50131E70968A86D17958E.description: Retell a story or recount an experience with appropriate facts and relevant details.

43DC71B0DFE50131E70868A86D17958E.description: Describe events, plans, and actions using logically sequenced and connected sentences with relevant details.

43DC06C0DFE50131E70768A86D17958E.description: Produce a simple, factual presentation supported by multimedia components and visual displays (e.g. graphics, sound) and using logically sequenced and connected sentences with relevant details.

43D7FF80DFE50131E6FE68A86D17958E.description: Use verbal and non-verbal communication when making announcements or introductions.

43D6AF80DFE50131E6FB68A86D17958E.description: Describe familiar experiences or events using both general and specific language.

43D1F720DFE50131E6F068A86D17958E.description: Presentational Speaking: The student will be able to present information, concepts, and ideas to an audience of listeners on a variety of topics in a culturally appropriate context in the target language.

43D18540DFE50131E6EF68A86D17958E.description: Think critically and apply concepts in the target language in order to more effectively communicate, solve problems, and accomplish goals when interacting with a native speaker.

43D11810DFE50131E6EE68A86D17958E.description: Deliver and defend recommendations in business, scientific, academic, or social contexts.

43D0B100DFE50131E6ED68A86D17958E.description: Speak with ease on almost all topics, using appropriate regional and colloquial expressions.

43D04990DFE50131E6EC68A86D17958E.description: Become a life-long learner by using the language for personal enjoyment and enrichment as well as for career purposes.

43CFDC10DFE50131E6EB68A86D17958E.description: Participate with ease in complex discussions with multiple participants on a wide variety of topics.

43CF6940DFE50131E6EA68A86D17958E.description: Express and defend viewpoints or recommendations on a variety of topics or statements.

43CF0590DFE50131E6E968A86D17958E.description: Convey finer shades of meaning with ease by using a wide range of expressions in any conversation or discussion.

43CEA120DFE50131E6E868A86D17958E.description: Use language for all purposes effectively and consistently.

43CDB790DFE50131E6E668A86D17958E.description: Prepare for and participate effectively in a discussion expressing solutions clearly and persuasively.

43CCC4F0DFE50131E6E468A86D17958E.description: Provide structured arguments and develop and support hypotheses, working around occasional difficulties.

43CBCA30DFE50131E6E268A86D17958E.description: Develop and defend complex information during debates or meetings.

43CA9490DFE50131E6DF68A86D17958E.description: Express self with fluency, flexibility, and precision on concrete and abstract topics.

43C9C5E0DFE50131E6DD68A86D17958E.description: Handle a complex situation or unexpected turn of events and propose solutions to problems presented during interaction.

43C95AD0DFE50131E6DC68A86D17958E.description: Exchange general information on a variety of topics outside fields of interest.

43C8E760DFE50131E6DB68A86D17958E.description: Use a variety of idiomatic and culturally authentic expressions appropriately.

43C7FA00DFE50131E6D968A86D17958E.description: Speak fluently, accurately, and effectively about a wide variety of events that occur in different time frames.

43C797C0DFE50131E6D868A86D17958E.description: Elaborate on and justify personal preferences, needs, and feelings.

43C72D20DFE50131E6D768A86D17958E.description: Take an active role in formal and informal discussions when communicating with native speakers in a variety of settings, types of discourse, topics, and registers.

43C6B1A0DFE50131E6D668A86D17958E.description: Express self with fluency and flexibility on a range of familiar and unfamiliar topics, including concrete, social, academic, and professional topics.

43C5EE50DFE50131E6D468A86D17958E.description: Collaborate to develop and propose solutions to problems.

43C589D0DFE50131E6D368A86D17958E.description: Incorporate formal and informal language and the appropriate register in a conversation.

43BCACF0DFE50131E6BF68A86D17958E.description: Initiate and maintain a conversation on a variety of familiar topics.

43BBA2B0DFE50131E6BD68A86D17958E.description: Express personal views and opinions on a variety of topics.

43B057A0DFE50131E6A468A86D17958E.description: Understand and use in context common concepts (such as numbers, days of the week, etc.) in simple situations.

43AFCE20DFE50131E6A368A86D17958E.description: Exchange essential information about self, family, and familiar topics.

43AF5AE0DFE50131E6A268A86D17958E.description: Ask simple questions and provide simple responses related to personal preferences.

43AE9560DFE50131E6A068A86D17958E.description: Introduce self and others using basic, culturally-appropriate greetings.

43ADC570DFE50131E69E68A86D17958E.description: Interpersonal Communication: The student will be able to engage in conversations and exchange information, concepts, and ideas orally and in writing with a variety of speakers or readers on a variety of topics in a culturally appropriate context in the target language.

43AD5190DFE50131E69D68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of written language intended for native speakers in a variety of settings, types of discourse, topics, styles, registers, and broad regional lexical variations.

43ACDF90DFE50131E69C68A86D17958E.description: Interpret and analyze forms of written language including abstract, structurally complex, or highly colloquial non-literary writings.

43AC6830DFE50131E69B68A86D17958E.description: Detect and interpret hidden meaning and recognize tone and subtlety from a variety of literary genres.

43ABF690DFE50131E69A68A86D17958E.description: Interpret information and draw conclusions of concepts and ideas with ease from culturally authentic sources on a variety of topics.

43AB2640DFE50131E69868A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of idiomatic expressions, proverbs, and sayings from a variety of texts and derive meaning from unknown words by using context clues.

43AAADE0DFE50131E69768A86D17958E.description: Analyze the primary argument and supporting details in written texts.

43AA1840DFE50131E69668A86D17958E.description: Interpret and synthesize meaning from a variety of fictional works and recognized the author's purpose.

43A9A900DFE50131E69568A86D17958E.description: Make appropriate inferences and recognize literary elements from a variety of culturally authentic sources.

43A8DED0DFE50131E69368A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of idioms and idiomatic expressions, and infer meaning of unfamiliar words used in context.

43A87240DFE50131E69268A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of the content and relevance of news items, articles, and reports on a wide range of professional topics.

43A7F590DFE50131E69168A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of different points of view presented through a variety of literary works.

43A78040DFE50131E69068A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of long, complex texts and recognize different literary and technical styles from a variety of culturally authentic sources.

43A6A710DFE50131E68E68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of main idea and supporting details from different types of texts that contain high-frequency idioms.

43A63D00DFE50131E68D68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of significant points and essential details presented through newspaper articles or official documents.

43A5DCC0DFE50131E68C68A86D17958E.description: Make inferences and predictions from a written source.

43A578D0DFE50131E68B68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of viewpoints expressed in literary and non-literary texts from a variety of culturally authentic sources.

43A49930DFE50131E68968A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of the main idea and supporting details when gathering information from texts that contain unfamiliar vocabulary, when reading for information.

43A43090DFE50131E68868A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of general written information presented through a variety of sources and intended for practical applications in academic and workplace contexts.

43A3CC10DFE50131E68768A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of the main idea and supporting details in fictional literary texts containing unfamiliar vocabulary that can be interpreted in context.

43A36280DFE50131E68668A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of the main idea and supporting details in texts on familiar and unfamiliar topics.

43A26F70DFE50131E68468A86D17958E.description: Recognize many high frequency idiomatic expressions from a variety of authentic texts of many unknown words by using context clues.

43A1FE30DFE50131E68368A86D17958E.description: Identify specific information in everyday authentic materials such as advertisements, brochures, menus, schedules, and timetables.

43A19440DFE50131E68268A86D17958E.description: Determine the main idea and essential details when reading narratives, literary selections, and other fictional writings on familiar topics.

43A12B00DFE50131E68168A86D17958E.description: Identify the main idea and key details in texts that contain familiar and unfamiliar vocabulary used in context.

43A05710DFE50131E67F68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of vocabulary used in context when following written directions.

439FE770DFE50131E67E68A86D17958E.description: Determine the meaning of a message and identify the author's purpose of authentic written texts such as advertisements and public announcements.

439F6220DFE50131E67D68A86D17958E.description: Interpret written literary text in which the writer tells or asks about familiar topics.

439EDBD0DFE50131E67C68A86D17958E.description: Use context clues and background knowledge to demonstrate understanding of the main idea and essential details in texts that contain familiar themes.

439E0F30DFE50131E67A68A86D17958E.description: Identify key, detailed information needed to fill out forms.

439DA630DFE50131E67968A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of signs and notices in public places.

439D3A00DFE50131E67868A86D17958E.description: Identify the elements of story such as setting, theme, and characters.

439CD1C0DFE50131E67768A86D17958E.description: Determine the main idea from simple texts that contain familiar vocabulary used in context.

439C0300DFE50131E67568A86D17958E.description: Recognize words and phrases when used in context on familiar topics.

439B8FE0DFE50131E67468A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of simple written announcements with prompting and support.

439B19D0DFE50131E67368A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of short, simple literary stories.

439AA0B0DFE50131E67268A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of written familiar words, phrases, and simple sentences supported by visuals.

4399BFB0DFE50131E67068A86D17958E.description: Interpretive Reading: The student will be able to understand and interpret information, concepts, and ideas in writing from a variety of culturally authentic sources on a variety of topics in the target language.

43995660DFE50131E66F68A86D17958E.description: Follow information from recorded, authentic, complex passages.

43916BB0DFE50131E65D68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of presentations where different accents and lexical variations are used.

43806A40DFE50131E63668A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of simple rhymes, songs, poems, and read aloud stories.

43800960DFE50131E63568A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of simple information supported by visuals through a variety of media.

437FA520DFE50131E63468A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of basic words and phrases in simple messages and announcements in familiar settings.

437F25A0DFE50131E63368A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of everyday expressions dealing with simple and concrete daily activities and needs presented in a clear, slow, and repeated speech.

437E8B80DFE50131E63268A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate understanding of basic words, phrases, and questions about self and personal experiences through gestures, drawings, pictures, and actions.

437DB540DFE50131E63068A86D17958E.description: Interpretive Listening: The student will be able to understand and interpret information, concepts, and ideas orally from a variety of culturally authentic sources on a variety of topics in the target language.
